item.title: Fn::ForEach intrinsic function
item.description: The Fn::ForEach intrinsic function introduces looping capabilities to your AWS CloudFormation templates. With Fn::ForEach, you can replicate parts of your templates with minimal lines of code. You can use Fn::ForEach to simplify your template layout and make it easier and faster for you and your peers to review your code.

item.title: Terminology change
item.description: AWS KMS is replacing the term customer master key (CMK) with AWS KMS key and KMS key. The concept has not changed. To prevent breaking changes, AWS KMS is keeping some variations of this term.

item.title: Stack failure options
item.description: You can iteratively develop your applications when provisioning failures are encountered by starting from the point of failure without rolling back successfully provisioned resources. By specifying stack failure options, you can troubleshoot resources in a CREATE_FAILED or UPDATE_FAILED status. You can provision failure options for all stack deployments and change set operations.

item.title: AWS CloudFormation StackSets integrates with AWS Organizations
item.description: Use StackSets to centrally manage deployments to all the accounts in your organization or specific organizational units (OUs) in AWS Organizations. You can enable automatic deployments to any new accounts added to your organization or OUs. The permissions needed to deploy across accounts will automatically be handled by StackSets. For more information, see Working with AWS CloudFormation StackSets.

item.description: The following resources were added: AWS::EC2::TransitGateway, AWS::EC2::TransitGatewayAttachment, AWS::EC2::TransitGatewayRoute, AWS::EC2::TransitGatewayRouteTable, AWS::EC2::TransitGatewayRouteTableAssociation, and AWS::EC2::TransitGatewayRouteTablePropagation.

item.title: New resources
item.description: The following resources were added: Alexa::ASK::Skill, AWS::AppSync::FunctionConfiguration, AWS::EC2::EC2Fleet, AWS::Kinesis::StreamConsumer, AWS::Route53Resolver:ResolverEndpoint, and AWS::Route53Resolver::ResolverRule.

item.title: Updated resources
item.description: The following resources were updated: AWS::ApiGateway::Deployment, AWS::ApiGateway::Stage, AWS::AutoScaling::AutoScalingGroup, AWS::EC2::EIP, AWS::ElasticLoadBalancingV2::Listener, AWS::EMR::Cluster, AWS::OpsWorks::Layer, AWS::RDS::DBCluster, AWS::RDS::DBInstance, AWS::S3::Bucket, and AWS::SNS::Topic.

item.title: Updated resource
item.description: The following resource was updated: AWS::CodePipeline::Pipeline.

item.title: Stack drift detection added
item.description: Drift detection enables you to detect whether a stack's actual configuration differs, or has drifted, from its expected template configuration as defined within AWS CloudFormation. You can have AWS CloudFormation detect drift on an entire stack, or individual stack resources.

item.title: Updated resources
item.description: The following resources have been updated: AWS::ApiGateway::Deployment, AWS::ApiGateway::Stage, AWS::CloudWatch::Alarm, AWS::EC2::SecurityGroupIngress, AWS::IAM::Role, AWS::IAM::User, AWS::IoT::TopicRule, AWS::KMS::Key, AWS::RDS::DBCluster, AWS::RDS::DBInstance, AWS::Route53::RecordSet, AWS::S3::Bucket, and AWS::Workspaces::Workspace.

item.title: The secretsmanager dynamic reference is now available.
item.description: Use the secretsmanager dynamic reference to retrieve entire secrets or secret values that are stored in AWS Secrets Manager for use in your templates. Secrets can be database credentials, passwords, third-party API keys, and even arbitrary text. Using the secretsmanager dynamic reference guarantees that neither Secrets Manager nor CloudFormation logs or persists any resolved secret value.

item.title: New resources
item.description: The following resources were added: AWS::DLM::LifecyclePolicy, AWS::SecretsManager::ResourcePolicy, AWS::SecretsManager::RotationSchedule, AWS::SecretsManager::Secret, and AWS::SecretsManager::SecretTargetAttachment.

item.title: Updated resource
item.description: The following resource was updated: AWS::SSM:MaintenanceWindow.

item.title: Updated resources
item.description: The following resources were updated: AWS::AppSync::DataSource, AWS::AppSync::Resolver, AWS::AutoScalingPlans::ScalingPlan, AWS::Batch::JobDefinition, AWS::Batch::ComputeEnvironment, AWS::CloudWatch::Alarm, AWS::IoT1Click::Placement, and AWS::IoT1Click::Project.

item.title: New resources
item.description: The following resources were added: AWS::AppStream::DirectoryConfig, AWS::AppStream::Fleet, AWS::AppStream::ImageBuilder, AWS::AppStream::Stack, AWS::AppStream::StackFleetAssociation, AWS::AppStream::StackUserAssociation, AWS::AppStream::User.

item.title: Updated resource
item.description: Updated the following resources: AWS::AmazonMQ::Broker, AWS::GuardDuty::Detector, and AWS::SSM::PatchBaseline.

item.title: New resource
item.description: Added the AWS::Events::EventBusPolicy resource.

item.title: UseOnlineResharding update policy now available.
item.description: To modify a replication group's shards by adding or removing shards, rather than replacing the entire AWS::ElastiCache::ReplicationGroup resource, use the UseOnlineResharding update policy.

item.title: Updated resources
item.description: The following resources have been updated: AWS::ApiGateway::Deployment, AWS::ApiGateway::Method, AWS::ApiGateway::Stage, AWS::ApiGateway::UsagePlan, AWS::CodeBuild::Project, AWS::CodeDeploy::DeploymentGroup, AWS::EC2::FlowLog, AWS::EC2::SpotFleet, AWS::EC2::VPCEndpoint, AWS::ECS::Service, AWS::ECS::TaskDefinition, and AWS::RDS::DBCluster.

item.title: New resources
item.description: The following resources were added: AWS::IoT1Click::Device, AWS::IoT1Click::Placement, and AWS::IoT1Click::Project.

item.title: New resource
item.description: Added the AWS::CloudFormation::Macro resource.

item.title: Macros now available
item.description: Use macros to perform custom processing on templates, from simple actions like find-and-replace operations to extensive transformations of entire templates.

item.title: Updated resources
item.description: Added the Logs property to AWS::AmazonMQ::Broker. Added the SecondaryArtifacts and SecondarySources properties to AWS::CodeBuild::Project.

item.title: Updated resources
item.description: Added the Configuration property to AWS::Glue::Crawler. Added the JsonClassifier and XMLClassifier properties to AWS::Glue::Classifier.

item.title: AWS CloudFormation now supports VPC endpoints powered by PrivateLink.
item.description: You can use a VPC endpoint to create a private connection between your VPC and AWS CloudFormation without requiring access over the Internet, through a NAT instance, a VPN connection, or AWS Direct Connect.

item.title: Dynamic references support secure strings
item.description: Use new dynamic references to specify values that are stored and managed in other services, including Systems Manager Parameter Store SecureString type parameters, in your stack templates.

item.title: Updated resources
item.description: The following resources were updated: AWS::ApiGateway::DomainName, AWS::CertificateManager::Certificate, AWS::EC2::VPCPeeringConnection, AWS::EFS::FileSystem, AWS::EMR::Cluster, AWS::RDS::DBClusterParameterGroup, AWS::SNS::Subscription, and AWS::SQS::Queue.

item.title: Updated resource
item.description: Added the SSESpecification property to AWS::DAX::Cluster.

item.title: New resource
item.description: Added the AWS::EC2::VPCEndpointServicePermissions resource.

item.title: Updated resource
item.description: Added the OverrideArtifactName property to AWS::CodeBuild::Project.

item.title: Updated resource
item.description: Added the EncryptionDisabled property to AWS::CodeBuild::Project.

item.title: Updated resource
item.description: Added the Timeout property to AWS::Batch::JobDefinition.

item.title: New resource
item.description: The following resource was added: AWS::IAM::ServiceLinkedRole.

item.title: Updated resources
item.description: Added the FieldLevelEncryptionId property to AWS::CloudFront::Distribution property types.

item.title: Updated resource
item.description: Added the HttpConfig property to AWS::AppSync::DataSource.

item.title: Updated resource
item.description: Added the ReportBuildStatus property to AWS::CodeBuild::Project.

item.title: New resource
item.description: The following resource was added: AWS::CodePipeline::Webhook.

item.title: Updated resource
item.description: Added the following properties to AWS::EC2::VPCEndpoint: PrivateDnsEnabled, SecurityGroupIds, SubnetIds, and VpcEndpointType.

item.title: New resources
item.description: The following resources were added: AWS::EC2::VPCEndpointConnectionNotification and AWS::EC2::VPCEndpointService.

item.title: Updated resource
item.description: Added the following property to AWS::ServiceDiscovery::Service: HealthCheckCustomConfig.

item.title: New resources
item.description: The following new resources were released: AWS::AmazonMQ::Broker and AWS::AmazonMQ::Configuration.

item.title: New resource
item.description: The following resource was added: AWS::SSM::ResourceDataSync.

item.title: New resource
item.description: The following resource was released: AWS::EKS::Cluster.

item.title: Updated resource
item.description: For the AWS::GuardDuty::Master resource, the InvitationId property is now optional.

item.title: New resources
item.description: The following new resources were released: AWS::SageMaker::Endpoint, AWS::SageMaker::EndpointConfig, AWS::SageMaker::Model, AWS::SageMaker::NotebookInstance, and AWS::SageMaker::NotebookInstanceLifecycleConfig.

item.title: Stack sets now support customized execution roles
item.description: Use customized execution roles in target accounts to control the stack resources that users or groups can include in their stack sets.

item.title: Selective updates of stack instances
item.description: Use the optional Accounts and Regions parameters to specify the accounts and regions in which to update stack instances during a stack set update operation.

item.title: New resources
item.description: The following new resources were released: AWS::Neptune::DBCluster, AWS::Neptune::DBClusterParameterGroup, AWS::Neptune::DBInstance, AWS::Neptune::DBParameterGroup, and AWS::Neptune::DBSubnetGroup.

item.title: Updated resources
item.description: The following resources were updated: AWS::ApiGateway::RestApi, AWS::AutoScaling::AutoScalingGroup, AWS::AutoScaling::LaunchConfiguration, AWS::DirectoryService::MicrosoftAD, AWS::DynamoDB::Table, AWS::EC2::Instance, AWS::ECS::Service, AWS::ECS::TaskDefinition, AWS::Elasticsearch::Domain, AWS::IAM::Role, AWS::KinesisFirehose::DeliveryStream, AWS::Lambda::EventSourceMapping, AWS::Logs::MetricFilter, and AWS::SSM::Association.

item.title: New resources
item.description: The following new resources were released: AWS::ServiceCatalog::AcceptedPortfolioShare, AWS::ServiceCatalog::CloudFormationProduct, AWS::ServiceCatalog::LaunchNotificationConstraint, AWS::ServiceCatalog::LaunchRoleConstraint, AWS::ServiceCatalog::LaunchTemplateConstraint, AWS::ServiceCatalog::Portfolio, AWS::ServiceCatalog::PortfolioPrincipalAssociation, AWS::ServiceCatalog::PortfolioProductAssociation, AWS::ServiceCatalog::PortfolioShare, AWS::ServiceCatalog::TagOption, and AWS::ServiceCatalog::TagOptionAssociation.

item.title: AWS CloudFormation now creates S3 buckets with encryption enabled
item.description: For Amazon S3 buckets that AWS CloudFormation creates to store uploaded stack templates, server-side encryption is now enabled by default, thereby encrypting all objects stored in those buckets.

item.title: New resource
item.description: The following resource was released: AWS::Budgets::Budget.

item.title: FIPS endpoints added
item.description: AWS CloudFormation now offers new endpoints which use FIPS 140-2 validated cryptographic modules in the following public US regions: US-East-1, US-East-2, US-West-1, and US-West-2.

item.title: New resource
item.description: The following resource was released: AWS::AutoScalingPlans::ScalingPlan.

item.title: New resource
item.description: The following resource was released: AWS::GuardDuty::Filter.

item.title: Updated resources
item.description: The following resources were updated: AWS::AppSync::GraphQLApi and AWS::GuardDuty::Member.

item.title: New resource
item.description: The following resource was released: AWS::ServiceCatalog::CloudFormationProvisionedProduct.
